metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28278 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists in jhead 3.04 and 3.05 via the RemoveSectionType function in jpgfile.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28278` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:2.97-1+deb8u2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jhead package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.97-1+deb8u2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
